attributes.action: Give parents a permit to park in parenting spaces.
attributes.additional_details:
As a mother to a young child I've discovered that  there are very few parenting parking spaces and quite often disabled vehicle users and non-parents will park in a child & parenting spot. Not only does this make it difficult to get a pram out of the boot but difficult to get my child out of the side door without the extra room. 

I propose a permit is given to expectant parents that they put in the window of the car and fines can be applied like for those who park in disabled bays.
attributes.background: Give parents (and pregnant women) a permit/card to be visible in their vehicle for parking in a child & parent parking space.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631832
